about_the_game:
This downloadable content for White Noise 2 allows you to play with Astaroth, the Duke of Hell. It also includes a new Idol to use in the game.

Astaroth, the Duke of Hell


One of the most ancient and powerful Demons, for centuries Astaroth has been seducing and tempting human beings to inadvertedly take part in his evil plots.

Now, all the pieces are in place, and it's time to take direct action and conquer all humanity.

Astaroth is a creature that makes use of his demonic powers to distress investigators and create chaos and panic among them.

Hellspawn


These amorphous creatures dwell in people's nightmares and feed upon their fear.

Astaroth, the Duke of Hell


One of the most ancient and powerful Demons, for centuries Astaroth has been seducing and tempting human beings to inadvertedly take part in his evil plots.

Now, all the pieces are in place, and it's time to take direct action and conquer all humanity.

Astaroth is a creature that makes use of his demonic powers to distress investigators and create chaos and panic among them.

These amorphous creatures dwell in people's nightmares and feed upon their fear.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 12.10 or newer
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: For AMD Graphic cards, MESA drivers newer than 10.1.5 are recommended.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: 2.5GHz dual-core Intel Core i5
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2 Graphics card
  • Storage: 1400 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.8+, tested on OSX 10.10+
  • Processor: Quad Core Processor
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: White Noise 2 - Astaroth

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP SP3
  • Processor: Dual Core processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 10 capable hardware
  • Storage: 1200 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 64bit OS recommended but not required
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Quad core processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 660 or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
